message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of recommendation with stream inputs, which involves machine learning and information retrieval techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) are likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a framework that models the creation of users and topics and the evolution of their interests, which involves probabilistic modeling and statistical inference, making cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) also possible sub-categories.
